 Pride comes before fall.

I love the Thief series, with the first one being my all time favorite. It's the only game I've ever gotten so involved in that I was actaully scared at one point. Not just startled, but actually afraid.
I have a seen a trailor for one of the theif games they look good but...I can't tell by the trailor's because they don't show much...

Well, if machine guns and big explosions are your thing, you might find it a little dull. But if you like games with tension and suspense, not to mention a bit of thinking, then give them a shot. You can probably find Thief 1 and 2 bundled together for 10 bucks if you look around a bit.
I saw the trailor for HALO2 it looks wicked.

post_info.post_title: The best game I have ever played!
